00033 #ifndef __AES_CMAC_HEADER__
00034 #define __AES_CMAC_HEADER__
00035 
00036 #ifdef __cplusplus
00037 extern "C" {

00039 
00040 #define CMAC_RESULT_SIZE AES_BLOCK_SIZE
00041 
00042 typedef struct AES_OMAC_Ctx
00043 {
00044     ubyte                   currBlock[AES_BLOCK_SIZE];
00045     /* bytes received -- we delay the processing until more bytes are
00046     received or final is called */
00047     ubyte                   pending[AES_BLOCK_SIZE] ;
00048     /* length of bytes received above <= AES_BLOCK_SIZE */
00049     ubyte                   pendingLen;
00050 } AES_OMAC_Ctx;
00051 
00052 typedef struct AESCMAC_Ctx
00053 {
00054     aesCipherContext        aesCtx;
00055     AES_OMAC_Ctx            omacCtx;
00056 } AESCMAC_Ctx;
00057

00061 /* AES CMAC -- cf RFC 4493 for explanations of parameters. */
00062 
00063 MOC_EXTERN MSTATUS AESCMAC_init(MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx) const ubyte *keyMaterial, sbyte4 keyLength, AESCMAC_Ctx *pCtx);
00064 
00065 MOC_EXTERN MSTATUS AESCMAC_update(MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx) const ubyte* data, sbyte4 dataLength, AESCMAC_Ctx* pCtx);
00066 
00067 MOC_EXTERN MSTATUS AESCMAC_final(MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx) ubyte cmac[CMAC_RESULT_SIZE], AESCMAC_Ctx* pCtx);
00068 
00069 /* reusable functions -- to be used internally by mocana only */
00070 MOC_EXTERN MSTATUS AES_OMAC_init(AES_OMAC_Ctx* pOMACCtx);
00071 MOC_EXTERN MSTATUS AES_OMAC_update(MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx) aesCipherContext* pAESCtx, AES_OMAC_Ctx* pOMACCtx, const ubyte* data, sbyte4 dataLength);
00072 MOC_EXTERN MSTATUS AES_OMAC_final( MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx) aesCipherContext* pAESCtx, AES_OMAC_Ctx* pOMACCtx, ubyte cmac[CMAC_RESULT_SIZE]);
